Have you ever played a roguelike and said: You know what would be fun? Fighting this archdemon with some of my friends! Well so have I!

Isleward is a browser-based game that combines all your favorite elements from popular MMOs, ARPGs and Roguelikes.

Latest features:

  • New Seasonal Event: Merrywinter
  • Card Sets
  • Idols
  • New Town

Features coming soon:

  • Alchemy
  • Player Housing
  • Guilds
  • Ship Voyages

Current Version: v0.1.8
